ModMetaData.name: ZPU-1/2/4
ModMetaData.author: amaoto
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Combat Extended only[/h1] Adds ZPU-1, ZPU-2 and ZPU-4. Supports Muzzle Flash. CE Only
If you like my mods consider buying me a kofi [url=https://ko-fi.com/amaoto] [img]https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/5c14e387dab576fe667689cf/61e11ddcc39341db4958c5cc_Supportbutton.png[/img][/url] [h1]Combat Extended only[/h1]
